Category.Name: Root
Category.ToolTip: Provides the Root of the GenICam features tree.
Category.Description: Provides the Root of the GenICam features tree.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Provides the default GenICam port of the Device.
Port.Description: Provides the default GenICam port of the Device.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: CurrentFrameRateMax
Float.ToolTip: Maximum frame acquisition rate with current camera settings.
Float.Description: Maximum frame acquisition rate with current camera settings.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Category.Name: ActionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Action control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Action control features.

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.

Integer.Name: ActionQueueSize
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the size of the scheduled action commands queue.
Integer.Description: Indicates the size of the scheduled action commands queue.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: TestPendingAck
Integer.ToolTip: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature.
Integer.Description: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

Category.Name: GigEVision
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the features pertaining to the GigE Vision transport layer of the device.
Category.Description: Category that contains the features pertaining to the GigE Vision transport layer of the device.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceTLVersionMajor).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceTLVersionMajor).

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceTLVersionMinor).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceTLVersionMinor).

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceRegistersEndianness).
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceRegistersEndianness).

Enumeration.Name: GevPhysicalLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the principal physical link configuration to use on next restart/power-up of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the principal physical link configuration to use on next restart/power-up of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevCurrentPhysicalLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the current physical link configuration of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

IntSwissKnife.Name: SupportedOptionValue
IntSwissKnife.Formula: SEL = 0 ? LLA : ( SEL = 1 ? DHCP : ( SEL = 2 ? PIP : ( SEL = 3 ? SCSS : ( SEL = 4 ? MCSS : ( SEL = 5 ? C : ( SEL = 6 ? W : ( SEL = 7 ? PR : ( SEL = 8 ? E : ( SEL = 9 ? ED : ( SEL = 10 ? PA : ( SEL = 11 ? A : ( SEL = 12 ? ES : ( SEL = 13 ? DD : ( SEL = 14 ? WD : ( SEL = 15 ? TD : ( SEL = 16 ? MT : ( SEL = 17 ? CAP : ( SEL = 18 ? LS : ( SEL = 19 ? HD : ( SEL = 20 ? SN : ( SEL = 21 ? LB : ( SEL = 22 ? PTP : ( SEL = 23 ? UA : ( SEL = 24 ? SAC : ( SEL = 25 ? PAS : ( SEL = 26 ? ES2 : ( SEL = 27 ? UN : ( SEL = 28 ? SL : ( SEL = 29 ? ML : ( SEL = 30 ? sLAG : ( SEL = 31 ? dLAG : ( SEL = 32 ? PFR : ( SEL = 33 ? PFG : ( 0))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsConcatenation
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if multiple operations in a single message are supported.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if multiple operations in a single message are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsWRITEMEM
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsPACKETRESEND
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENT
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsEVENTDATA
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which logical link to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which logical link to control.

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkSpeed).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkSpeed).

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the logical link.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevPAUSEFrameReception
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevPAUSEFrameTransmission
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether PAUSE Frames can be generated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether PAUSE Frames can be generated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given logical link.

Enumeration.Name: GevIPConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the current IP configuration status.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the current IP configuration status.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the GenICam XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkSelector).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkSelector).

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent IP address for this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent IP address for this logical link.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this logical link.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the persistent default gateway for this logical link.
Integer.Description: Controls the persistent default gateway for this logical link.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceEventChannelCount).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceEventChannelCount).

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceStreamChannelCount).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceStreamChannelCount).

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout).

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See the increment of the TimestampLatchValue feature).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See the increment of the TimestampLatchValue feature).

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See TimestampLatchValue).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See TimestampLatchValue).

Integer.Name: GevDiscoveryAckDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.
Integer.Description: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.

Boolean.Name: GevIEEE1588
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.
Boolean.Description: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.

Enumeration.Name: GevIEEE1588Status
Enumeration.ToolTip: Provides the status of the IEEE 1588 clock.
Enumeration.Description: Provides the status of the IEEE 1588 clock.

Enumeration.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodesSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GigE Vision version to control extended status codes for.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodes
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of extended status codes.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of extended status codes.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPPengingAck
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.
Boolean.Description: Enables the generation of PENDING_ACK.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPHeartbeatDisable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceHeartbeatMode).
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceHeartbeatMode).

Integer.Name: GevGVCPPengingTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkCommandTimeout).
Integer.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceLinkCommandTimeout).

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSwitchoverKey
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
Integer.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceStreamChannelEndianness).
Boolean.Description: This feature is deprecated (See DeviceStreamChannelEndianness).

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: This GigE Vision specific feature corresponds to DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize and should be kept in sync with it.
Integer.Description: This GigE Vision specific feature corresponds to DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize and should be kept in sync with it.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in GEV timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in GEV timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: Priority1
Integer.ToolTip: Priority1
Integer.Description: Priority1

Integer.Name: Priority2
Integer.ToolTip: Priority2
Integer.Description: Priority2

Boolean.Name: SlaveOnly
Boolean.ToolTip: Slave Only
Boolean.Description: Slave Only

Integer.Name: LogAnnounceInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Log Announce Interval
Integer.Description: Log Announce Interval

Integer.Name: AnnounceReceiptTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Announce Receipt Timeout
Integer.Description: Announce Receipt Timeout

Integer.Name: LogSyncInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Log Sync Interval
Integer.Description: Log Sync Interval
